6ead9f24-c4a4-4109-8860-18f60a457af3.name: 战斗反射
6ead9f24-c4a4-4109-8860-18f60a457af3.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

5bfd3e38-a811-4be1-9002-39fe76610459.name: 健康
5bfd3e38-a811-4be1-9002-39fe76610459.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

d7779d2a-d5bb-4db8-b217-7dc4d0c6f6f9.name: Insomniac (Mild)
d7779d2a-d5bb-4db8-b217-7dc4d0c6f6f9.notes: 两个失眠周期之间相隔 3d 天，由 GM 秘密投骰

b729e43f-7ee9-49da-9712-62dab5fdb9a4.name: Insomniac (Severe)
b729e43f-7ee9-49da-9712-62dab5fdb9a4.notes: 两个失眠周期之间相隔 2d-1 天，由 GM 秘密投骰

5c3036a6-e58e-4749-82c9-ffb6a3da6330.name: 范围：任何与你不同的人

4870fc2a-48a9-468e-97cc-dedec3e04143.name: 和平主义：不能伤害无辜

fe3712b3-b40a-47f2-9df3-8861476df062.name: Penetration Service
fe3712b3-b40a-47f2-9df3-8861476df062.notes: Add 8 more points to any 1 skill as an "aptitude skill"

31fc7703-f73a-4f9d-928a-0bedcc1c9bec.name: Choose 1 Division Skill Package
31fc7703-f73a-4f9d-928a-0bedcc1c9bec.notes: Packages denoted with † change duty to hazardous and require -5 more points in disadvantages.
